Nighlight/Perceptor::


Perceptor roared annoyed and fired some blasts against Blackfang 
before retreat. 

Nighlight moved close to Hot rod and looked towards the Predacon 
leader.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He is blated in the stomach by the two plasma shots. This causes 
him to double over, as the rockets pass over him.
> 
> He watches as Megatron calls for a retreat.
> 
> He fires two rockets at the retreating Predacon leader.
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup pulls up out side the Maximal base. He transformes to bot mode, 
and goes in, searching for the disturbance.
